name: ⑦APPGPS开关
description: 打开应用开启GPS，关闭应用(3000毫秒＝3秒)后关闭GPS，使用全局变量APPGPS--酷安@幻觉
condition: if(frontPkgChanged == true && globalVarOf$APPGPS.contains(to)) { (hw.enableLocation() ? "打开GPS成功" : "打开GPS失败") } else if ( pkgKilled == true && globalVarOf$APPGPS.contains(pkgName)) {Thread.sleep(3000) + (hw.disableLocation() ? "关闭GPS成功" : "关闭GPS失败") }
